org.svvrl.goal.core.aut

Class Acc<R extends Run>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditable
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AutomatonComponent
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.Acc<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of runs
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, Editable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractNBWLikeAcc, AbstractNGBWLikeAcc, AbstractNRWLikeAcc, AbstractNTBWLikeAcc, AbstractNTGBWLikeAcc, AbstractNTRWLikeAcc

    public abstract class Acc<R extends Run>
extends AutomatonComponent
    This class defines some common parts of acceptance conditions.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayName

        public java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Returns the name of this acceptance condition for display. This method is the same as getASCIIName() by default. Override this function if Unicode characters are preferred for display.
        Returns:
        the name of this acceptance condition for display

      • getASCIIName

        public abstract java.lang.String getASCIIName()
        Returns the name of this acceptance condition in ASCII.
        Returns:
        the name of this acceptance condition in ASCII

      • clone

        public abstract Acc<R> clone(java.util.Map<State,State> smap,
                             java.util.Map<Transition,Transition> tmap)
        Makes a clone of this acceptance condition. The content of the clone will be changed according to the given maps.
        Parameters:
        smap - a map from states of the automaton with this acceptance condition to states of another automaton with the clone of this acceptance condition
        tmap - a map from transitions of the automaton with this acceptance condition to transitions of another automaton with the clone of this acceptance condition
        Returns:
        the clone of this acceptance condition

      • clone

        public abstract Acc<R> clone()
        Makes a clone of this acceptance condition.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the clone of this acceptance condition

        public abstract int size()
        Returns the size of this acceptance condition.
        Returns:
        the size of this acceptance condition

        protected AutomatonEvent createAutomatonEvent()
        Creates an automaton event to indicate that this acceptance condition has been modified.
        Specified by:
        createAutomatonEvent in class AutomatonComponent
        Returns:
        the automaton event indicating changes on this acceptance condition

      • contains

        public abstract boolean contains(GraphicComponent comp)
        Checks if this acceptance condition contains a component.
        Parameters:
        comp - the component to be found in this acceptance condition
        Returns:
        true if the component in contained in this acceptance condition

        public abstract <T extends GraphicComponent> void replace(T comp,
                                                          java.util.Set<T> set)
        Replaces a component with a set of other components.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the components
        Parameters:

        set - the set of components for substitution

      • isMergeable

        public abstract <T extends GraphicComponent> boolean isMergeable(T e1,
                                                                 T e2)
        Returns true if two components can be merged without changing the accepting runs of this acceptance condition.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the components
        Parameters:
        e1 - a component
        e2 - another component
        Returns:
        true if the two components can be merged without changing the accepting runs of this acceptance condition

      • isAccepting

        public abstract boolean isAccepting(R run)
        Checks if a run is accepting under this acceptance condition.
        Parameters:
        run - the run to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the run is accepting under this acceptance condition

      • setVisible

        protected abstract void setVisible(GraphicComponent c,
                                   boolean b)
        Makes a component visible or invisible in this acceptance condition. The effect is the same as removing the component from this acceptance condition but the removal can be recovered.
        Parameters:
        c - a component
        b - true to make the component visible and invisible otherwise

      • setVisible

        protected void setVisible(java.util.Collection<GraphicComponent> cs,
                          boolean b)
        Makes a collection of components visible or invisible in this acceptance condition. The effect is the same as removing the components from this acceptance condition but the removal can be recovered.
        Parameters:
        cs - a set of components
        b - true to make the components visible and invisible otherwise

      • isInfinite

        public abstract boolean isInfinite()
        Returns true if every run accepted by this acceptance condition is infinite.
        Returns:
        true if every run accepted by this acceptance condition is infinite
